About me



I am currently pursuing a Computer Science Bachelor degree at the National University of Singapore and am currently looking for an internship related to Software Engineering and Artificial Intelligence. I have a strong passion in programming and software development. As a software engineer, I pride myself on writing readable and testable code that is scalable. I believe that Artificial Intelligence provides for unique ways to solve many problems that were not solvable in the past.

I am not only a hardworker, but also a smart worker who tries to find unique and efficient methods to solve problems. I do not give up easily and will always try my best to achieve the best solutions to any given problem.

GitHub

MEnion

  • A task manager which manages the daily tasks and activities of the user.
  • It is operated primarily with keyboard which allows greater efficiency for the user.
  • Built using Java and JavaFX.
  • Coursework for CS2103 Software Engineering Module.
GitHub

iQueue

  • Online queuing system for patrons to order and queue up for their food.
  • Integrated with NUS IVLE system, allowing seamless and secure access for students and staff of NUS.
  • 2 different interfaces for patrons and storeowners.
  • Project for NUS Orbital Summer Programme.
  • Build with the MEANJS Stack, HTML, CSS and Twitter Bootstrap.
